subject: #SSN4699
description_text:
Hello,

i ordered express delivery from you (â‚¬26.95), which, according to the order, was supposed to arrive by December 23, 2025.

conversations.body_text: Hi Sergejhaak,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELI1290534188YQ,JSELN1203096893YQ
